subtitleNullable: News articles marked based on their sentiment.
descriptionNullable:
### Context

For the past year, there has been a plethora of negative news following one after the other. The idea behind building this dataset was to find a way to tag just the positive news and read that. 

It began as a simple project to just understand what would really be considered positive news. Sooner than expected, it forayed into a myriad of thoughts, and that led to the collection of this data. It is a skewed dataset (who knew finding actual negative tagged articles would be so difficult?) 

Data collection sources:
- Positive news links:
 -- Scraped from r/UpliftingNews
- Negative links: 
 -- (To be filled. It was from a dataset from a research paper) 


### Content

- **News title**: The tiles of the news articles. 
- **reddit title**: If the link was scraped from reddit, then the title of the reddit post. 
- **sentiment**: 0 indicates negative news, 1 indicates positive.
- **text**: The text of the entire dataset
- **url**: Url of the entire article. Can be used to find more features if needed. 


### Acknowledgements

To be filled with the research paper dataset.
